attributes.action: Implement a better complaints procedure for constituents
attributes.additional_details:
Publicly explain the British governments position on the New World Order which was promised to the Jews in 1940 according to historic news articles of the time, was a plan of Adolf Hitler according to Franklin D Roosevelt, a goal of the Skull & Bones secret society according to highly respected university professors, a goal of the Illuminati secret society according to British MPs, and constantly mentioned by politicians both in Britain and America.

The New World Order is treason, because in order to have a New World Order the sovereignty of Britain has to be given away. Millions of men and women didn't give their lives in world war 2 for the very sovereignty they died to defend to be given away.

rejection.details: Implement a better complaints procedure for constituents is a matter for individual members of parliament and not a matter for Government
